July 27, 2018
Hi, I’m Blake Yule! 17 Year Veteran of EMC, joined Pivotal 3 years ago. I run a Pivotal Synergy Team focused on helping DellEMC Americas sellers drive business outcomes through digital transformation.
1. Win of the Week - USAF
United States Air Force partnered with DellEMC, Pivotal and Raytheon to change the way their Global Air Force Operations Centers build software. $47MM Deal, Dell’s trusted relationship and knowledge of DoD, Pivotal Methodologies and Platform, running on Pivotal Ready Architecture (PRA) proved to be Better Together!
<[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u5tn76xjAfc]]>
2. Better Together - Video
Whether a customer uses VMs, containers, functions or platforms, Dell Tech has the right infra stack to support it all. The question is, in what abstraction layer does your customer want to run their apps? This 15 min video <[[https://youtu.be/rCuW4V2K0Gc]]> will make you an expert in identifying where the workloads reside. Pivotal, VMware, and DellEMC are Better Together.
3. PIVOTAL’S PREMIER CUSTOMER EVENT: SpringOne Platform
IF YOU WANT TO SELL PIVOTAL READY ARCHITECTURE… INVITE YOUR EXECUTIVES and their TEAMS TO S1P!!! Make sure your customers are aware of Pivotal's premier customer event SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]>. 4,000+ Customers and Partners from Pivotal's Spring Development and Cloud Foundry communities will be attending on September 24-27, 2018 in Washington DC National Harbor, MD. Invite LOB Developers and IT Ops Teams and we will be there to drive executive and technical meetings.
Customers can register at SpringOnePlatform.Io <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]>, and use code S1P_SPON_DELLEMC20 or S1P_SPON_VMWARE20 for a 20% discount..
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]>
4. Top 5 Questions to ask your CIO
Every CIO is being asked for a Cloud Strategy which eliminates legacy costs and enables their people to succeed in the new IT Operating model.
- What apps are you building to attract and retain customer business? - Do you want to go faster? - What efforts are you driving to control costs of your legacy apps? - How are you staying compliant and securing cloud-based apps? - What’s your strategy for Kubernetes?
Don’t forget to BRING PIVOTAL SALES to the meeting!
5. Pivotal Drives Storage & Data Protection
- 80% Pivotal customers run on premise
- Pivotal Ready Architecture (PRA) is the best on-premise solution
- PRA is 150% cheaper, more secure, and faster to deploy than DIY or public cloud
If you have an opportunity, please complete this short survey <[[http://pivotal.io/dell-survey]]> and the Synergy Team will contact you.
